casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Vernon VASSELL Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 31, 2018

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 79 Conn.App. 843, 832 A.2d 99 (2003), is denied as untimely.

ROBINSON, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
